Package net.emuman.spigotutils.npc

Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.emuman.spigotutils.npc.NPC
  • public class NPC
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper for EntityPlayer that allows for the basic creation of fake player entities in a server.

      • NPC

        public NPC​(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin,
           org.bukkit.Location location,
           java.lang.String name,
           java.lang.String skinName)
        Creates a new NPC.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin using the new NPC.
        location - the location at which to spawn the new NPC.
        name - the name of the new NPC.
        skinName - the name of the player whose skin should be used on the NPC.

      • spawnForPlayer

        public void spawnForPlayer​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Spawns in the NPC for the player permanently (until player logs off or NPC#despawnForPlayer is called).
        Parameters:
        player - the player to spawn the NPC in for.

      • despawnForPlayer

        public void despawnForPlayer​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Despawns the NPC for the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to despawn the NPC for.

        public net.minecraft.server.v1_16_R3.EntityPlayer getEntityPlayer()

      • getAllNPCs

      • isInRenderDistance

        public boolean isInRenderDistance​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Determines whether or not the specified player is within the specified render distance of the NPC.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the player is within render distance, false otherwise.
